**User:**
I'm still trying to wrap my head around how VerusIDs work. Can you tell me more about the relationship between an ID and a currency in Verus?

**AI Assistant:**
In Verus, a currency can be created with a specific name only by the controller of an ID with the same name. This means that if you want to create a currency called "gold@", you need to have an ID called "gold@" and be its controller. Additionally, a currency can only be created once by the controller of the corresponding ID.

**AI Assistant:**
Having an ID with the same name as the currency you want to create is necessary because only the controller of that ID can create a currency with that name. This ensures that the creator of the currency has control over it and can manage its properties.
